page.title: 06SATURDAY
page.content: I wake up at 5:45am and get dressed. Outside there is an old shed with glass doors.I get on my Extra Burner and ride to my Grandads farm where I meet my Grandad.First we feed 18 calves with Bibby powdered milk. Then I untie the dog and she jumps into the Landrover so we go up the road to the other farm where we fill the cake bags up with cow cake.Next we go to the fields and my Grandad stands on the tailboard with a bag in his hands so I get in the drivers seat, so the cake pours out.Next we go back to the farm and bed up with 2 big bails of straw. The Manitou lifts them into the barn. After that we have breakfast which consists of one egg and four slices of toast.After that we go home and make sandwiches. Then we collect our fishing tackle and walk to the bus stop where we meet Charles and Jason.
